name: react-native-macro-tracker
description: API for Macro Tracker React Native App

scripts.deploy:dev: cd backend && terraform init -backend-config=dev.config && terraform apply -var-file=dev.tfvars
scripts.destroy:dev: cd backend && terraform init -backend-config=dev.config && terraform destroy -var-file=dev.tfvars
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
